news.title: Twitter is Changing Twitter.com to be More Like Mobile App
news.description: Twitter will unify the mobile and desktop experience on its website by tailoring each component of the site to individual users.

news.title: The US Government is Fining Facebook $5 Billion for Privacy Violations, and Wall Street Thinks That’s Great News
news.description: News of the relatively small penalty against the social media giant increased its stock price, and signaled to investors that regulators will not require significant changes to Facebook’s business operations any time soon.

news.title: Facebook’s Libra Cryptocurrency Attacked at Senate Hearing
news.description: Multiple senators have questioned Facebook’s cryptocurrency plans in light of its recent privacy and election-related scandals.

news.title: Instagram Expands its Test of Removing Like Counts
news.description: Instagram has been running tests in multiple countries outside of the U.S. in which users do not see a post’s like counts or any likes at all.
